' uber is part of a wave of smartphone apps that match taxi drivers to customers in seconds . the californian-firm operates in more than 100 cities in 30 countries , but other similar apps are available including hailo , gettaxi and , most recently , uk-based taxicode . each app lets users compare rates and add credit cards to an account so they do n't need cash . they have been criticised summary: taxi firm uber currently operates in 100 cities around the world .   it matches users with nearby drivers , and payments are made via the app .   following news of google 's new self-driving cars , uber ceo travis kalanick said its drivers could one day be replaced by autonomous cars .   kalanick admitted the technology could potentially keep costs down .   these savings would then be passed on to its millions of customers .
